comment: Good professor, really tires to engage everyone in class. You will probably get out of class 30 to 40 minutes early most class days. And he gives out a lot of extra credit to those who show up on days with low attendance.
Dr. Rooney was awesome made this class much more interesting than it would have been. Good prep for tests.

He was super easy! Take his class if you don't really care about your required freshman class. Two test. STUDY WHAT HE TELLS YOU. A couple projects/papers, but they are very easy and he grades them very easily. Fun class. Lots of discussions. Probably the best guy to take for a seminar cause i've heard that the others are lots of work!

Extremely funny and laid back. He is very flexible and his tests were very straight forward. You need to go to class to know what's on the tests. He made a very boring class a lot more interactive and interesting than anyone else could have done.

HIGHLY recommend Dr. Rooney. He is extremely laid back and funny. This was by far the easiest class of my semester. there is very little work except studying a little bit for the tests which were easy. There is one group project and a couple other outside class assignments that are simple but definitely get him if you can!

I love this man. He's so funny and laid back. Definitely try to get his class. Even though they are evening classes, they are well worth it. The only trap is, he doesn't remind you of the extra activities to do outside of class so you can't forget about those or your grade will drop tremendously. If you can, take him.

This guy is probably the most laid back professor ever! All you have to do is go to the study session that he does before the test and you have absolutely nothing to worry about! He is also a very funny guy. I Made an A in the class!
Easy enough, never went to class. Made an A. Tests are straight off the study guide, and final is optional if you have perfect attendance. Gives very random extra credit.
The best teacher! His class is so much fun. I always looked forward to going. Take him if given the chance!

I love Dr. Rooney! He makes his class so much fun. We always leave class early. His study guides tell you exactly what is on the test. He jokes around a lot which is nice..overall take him if you get the chance. You won't regret it.

Too many projects!!!! It's a freshmen seminar class, calm down. We always got to leave 45 minutes early, and study guides told you exactly what was gonna be on test. His bonus questions are totally pointless though... But make it interesting. He kind of acts like freshmen himself? But over all, he was an okay teacher. Just way too many projects.
